dt-option.name: sorting
dt-option.summary: Initial sort to apply to the table
dt-option.description:
If sorting is enabled, then DataTables will perform a first pass sort during initialisation. Using this parameter you can define which column(s) the sort is performed upon, and the sorting direction. The `dt-init sorting` can take two forms:
* An array with two entries: * Column index to sort upon * Direction so sort to apply (`string asc` or `string desc`) * An array of arrays, each inner array with the two options above. This allows a multi-column sort to be defined as the initial state.
